name: SMB Fetch, Windows Meterpreter Shell, Bind Named Pipe Inline (x64)
author: Spencer McIntyre
UserExistsError
sf <stephen_fewer@harmonysecurity.com>
OJ Reeves
description:
Fetch and execute an x64 payload from an SMB server.
Connect to victim and spawn a Meterpreter shell. Requires Windows XP SP2 or newer.
